website_summaries.verdict: A solidly built, entry level grill that has a great deal to offer the burgeoning barbecue chef.
pros: This grill offers 675 square inches of cooking surface and features a handy collapsable workspace that runs across the front of the unit
There is a side door that allows quick and easy access to the cooking fuel, which means there is minimal heat loss when refueling
cons: Some of the connections are not flush, which may allow heat to escape while cooking

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend purchasing a grill from Dynaglo
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend purchasing a grill from Dynaglo. My lid had a welding defect (see photo) and the left hinge broke away from the lid and therefore this assembly needed to be completely replaced. Rather than disassemble the whole grill and send back to Amazon I chose to pursue a replacement lid under warranty. I had conversations with two different customer service reps on 2 successive days and they both promised a response that day once I emailed them proof of purchase. They were less than friendly and I still don’t have any response. Not very good customer service in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: These are made in China and were previously sold under the Brinkmann brand it seems. Unit arrived with a few dents and scratches due to all parts being somewhat loosely packed inside the barrel. Some areas did not get a full coat of paint resulting in rust upon delivery. Lack of an ash catcher is its main flaw. Quite a few gaps around the lid. Still decent but would not suggest paying more than the current $100 for it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great product - worst customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, I use it at least 4 or 5 times already and is great. The only problem I have is that to be able to attach the thermometer to the cover this one has to have a threaded hole which came plain. I try to contact Dyna-Glo customer service by phone and using their web page but is imposible. I really don't want to return the whole product (is really heavy and a nightmare for the logistics) but will have to.
customer_reviews.author: Mariano F.

customer_reviews.title: Now for the good news I love it and it robust
customer_reviews.text: I would have 5 stars for this but the felt sealer "o-ring" was torn in 2 and the wheel rod was a little bent. I did buy an "open box" warehouse deals grill for a substantial discount so I can't really complain. Now for the good news I love it and it robust, The thing that I think will help other customers realize that this is much better quality then the many look a-likes is the weight. The walls and lid of this are thick and that makes all the difference when it comes to long term use! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Ray Op

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on Amazon given other retailers sell it for twice their price
customer_reviews.text: Great grill, well made and easy to use. Set up is a pain and the manufacturer could have made it much easier by welding the flange pieces to the firebox instead of making you bolt them on. Otherwise assembly is straightforward. My only dislike is that the door on the side of the firebox does not extend down to the bottom of the side requiring you to scoop out ash instead of scraping it out. That said, it makes a better seal then the doors that do not have a lower lip. All in all I am very please with my grill.
customer_reviews.author: dc-in-md

customer_reviews.title: Looks as though it will do a good job cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made item; you can tell by the weight alone. It will last several lifetimes. Looks as though it will do a good job cooking; however. it is more suited to a serious party giver or a restaurant or other substantial user. For me, when it arrived, I realized that it was much to big for my needs, and a lot of weight to be hauling in and out of the garage. So I reluctantly sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Keppelman

customer_reviews.title: Nice big grill
customer_reviews.text: The grill is large with good grates making it easy to grill vegetables and meat at the same time. For my purpose, it is great that I can have some area hot (for searing) and some area less hot. Overall, it is a lot of grill for the money. You don't get everything for this price: it is not so airtight that you can kill the fire by closing the vents, but you won't get that for this price (Webers may close tightly for a short time, but mine never did for long).
customer_reviews.author: Bent E Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheels
customer_reviews.text: The pit looks & cooks great but my favorite features are the large metal wheels. Another popular brand has this type but the wheels are not as solid. The whole pit is very solid & I highly recommend this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Melskipr

customer_reviews.title: Expect some dents
customer_reviews.text: Product alive well package ..upon opening I discovered two large dents on both sides of barrel at hinges .. right side was dented up left side was push down. .. Upon assy. I use a floorjack and 2x4 and rubber hammer .. Perfect .. Lid closed..very little smoke escape. Hold the heat
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something with thicker steel, but for the price of the grill you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality craftsmanship at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Well made, large, charcoal grill that is priced right. Get the custom cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ennius1

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best built grills ever
customer_reviews.text: This grill is super heavy duty and we'll built. Temperature control is amazing, seals tight and cooks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Quality Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy probably the last grill I'll buy. The only thing I didn't like was the drip cup is not included.
customer_reviews.author: K E

customer_reviews.title: Very nice versatile grill
customer_reviews.text: Great grill for the money. I also own an expensive pellet smoker and wanted something charcoal for steaks and wings this fit the bill perfectly. Grates could stay in place a little better. Only reason for your instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly and Ryan Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this Charcoal grill, cook over Hickory wood, food is Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Grate looking grill
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and put it together can't wait to try it out tomorrow. Left out 1 star because it didn't come a ash pan. Will update review after 1st use...... Update to first review giving 5 stars now that I have used it I can over look that it don't have a ash pan aluminum foil in the bottom for easy clean up. Grill works grate
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Using it as a smoker and it works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Well built for the price. It holds it's temp well. I've been able to dial it right in. I use it as a smoker and it has produced great BBQ. One of my favorite smoker/grills I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Built solid
customer_reviews.text: Used for first time smoking meats distributes heat and holds constant temp well. Holds good amount of meat. I also bought offset smoker for it. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price.....customer service was excellent for the couple issues I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might become damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The grill is built very well and is very heavy but during shipping it looks like it was damaged and a large Dent was put into the backside of the grill
customer_reviews.author: jessy w.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, this grill is pure magic
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill I’ve owned. Worth every penny and then some.
customer_reviews.author: JAWOODWORKS

customer_reviews.title: dented up on arrival
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty grill that looks as promised, but..... it was packaged badly and dented up and many places. smoke stack gasket fell apart in my hand. too heavy and a pain in the A to package back up and send back.
customer_reviews.author: robinson j payne

customer_reviews.title: A slight inconvience with the charcoal but otherwise I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving it. A slight inconvience with the charcoal but otherwise I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Allison Sr.

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo Signature Series DGSS675CB-D Heavy-Duty Barrel Charcoal Grill
product_meta.description: Style:Large Signature GrillMaximize your outdoor cooking experience while keeping storage to a minimum. The Heavy-Duty Barrel Charcoal Grill features a collapsible steel front work station which provides more space within a compact area. This grill is equipped with a professional-grade, stainless steel temperature gauge, indicating ideal temperatures for grilling and smoking. The porcelain enameled steel cooking grates allow for maximum heat transfer and searing. The Dyna-Glo Heavy Duty Compact Charcoal Grill is compatible with the DGSS287CB-D offset smoker box (Sold separately).
feature_bullets: Total cooking area is 675 Square inches
Warming shelf on offset smoker box lid
Compatible with the DGSS287CB-D offset smoker box (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
